item.title: Intel RST RAID Non-RAID Disk after BIOS update
item.description: So, having nothing better to do and for no good reason I decided to update my workstation’s BIOS to the latest version released by Gigabyte. Since ignoring _the “__If it works don’t fix it” _mantra is always a good idea. Beautiful, after update two of my disks from a four disk RAID10 array were showing as Non-RAID Disk. I had backups but shuffling 2TB+ of data is never fun. Initial reports were all grim, the Intel RST BIOS does not allow repairing.
